column5: Multiple entry US visa holders do not require a visa.
Holders of US Canada Japan or select European visas do not require a visa for up to 30 days.
Electronic visa holders must arrive via
Holders of US visa do not require a visa for up to 180 days.
28 days eVisa holders must arrive via
Holders of US Canada or Schengen visa may obtain a 90-day visa on arrival.
30 days for a maximum total stay of 90 days within any 180 day period.
30 days visa on arrival provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
90 days within any 180 day period; visa not required for service tourist and private trips on conditions that documents certifying the purpose of the trip are provided.
